user.title: GitHub Authentication
user.description:
Enter your GitHub Personal Access Token (PAT) to access private repositories.

For private repos, your PAT needs the 'repo' scope.
Leave empty to enter repository URL manually.

select_repo.title: Select Repository
select_repo.description:
Found {repo_count} repositories for user {username}.
Select a repository to add or choose to enter URL manually.

manual.title: Add Private Repository
manual.description:
Enter the details for the GitHub repository to track.

Note: For private repositories, you must provide a PAT with 'repo' scope.

error.insufficient_permissions: Token lacks required permissions. For private repos, ensure PAT has 'repo' scope.
error.repo_not_found: Repository not found or token lacks access
error.rate_limited: GitHub API rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
error.repo_access_error: Cannot access repository with provided token

sync_now.name: Sync Now
sync_now.description: Trigger an immediate sync of all configured private repositories.

reload_repos.name: Reload Private Repos
reload_repos.description: Force refresh all private repositories and check for updates.
